name: Weed Thingy
description:
NOTE:

MADE FOR LUDUM DARE 46

Please keep in mind that this is our first Game Jam, as well as our first "full" game we ever made. Also, were German, so we apologize for any grammar issues and spelling mistakes.

---------------------------------------------------------------

This Game is a highscore-based limited time adventure.

In this game, you play as a farmer. Your objective is to remove all the Weed from your field to keep alive your plants. You have one minute to destroy as much weed as you can.

You can collect coins, which give you a time boost as well as extra points, as well as power-ups in the form of nuts to get a speed boost to collect more stuff in a shorter time.
